price: Então, se renegais a Fé, como vos guardareis do castigo de um dia, que fará das crianças anciãs encanecidas?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yajʿalu al-wil'dāna shīban
